resources.string: • What it does: Shows your device’s horizontal and vertical tilt like a real spirit level.
– Place the device on the surface you want to level.
– Adjust the tilt. When you hear a beep and the bubble turns green, it’s level.
– Use Flat, Portrait and Landscape modes to measure in different orientations.
– Flat detects level in both axes.
– Portrait and Landscape measure a single direction. Use the pause button to freeze the bubble.
